description: Checks whether the actor can throw a grenade at his target. If he can't then result will be undefined, otherwise the result is the resultant velocity vector.

params.name: hand offset
description: The estimated offset of the hand for the throw.

params.name: method
description: The grande toss method. Can be "min energy", "min time", and "max tune".

params.name: random range
description: Random range from target position to throw at.
